biotools.summary: KinOrtho is method for mapping human kinase orthologs across the tree of life and illuminating understudied kinases. It is a combination of full-length and domain-based orthology inference methods.

bioschemas.name: KinOrtho
bioschemas.summary: KinOrtho is method for mapping human kinase orthologs across the tree of life and illuminating understudied kinases. It is a combination of full-length and domain-based orthology inference methods.
